CreateServer.name: CreateServer
CreateServer.description: Grants permission to create a server

CreateUser.name: CreateUser
CreateUser.description: Grants permission to add a user associated with a server

DeleteServer.name: DeleteServer
DeleteServer.description: Grants permission to delete a server

DeleteSshPublicKey.name: DeleteSshPublicKey
DeleteSshPublicKey.description: Grants permission to delete an SSH public key from a user

DeleteUser.name: DeleteUser
DeleteUser.description: Grants permission to delete a user associated with a server

DescribeSecurityPolicy.name: DescribeSecurityPolicy
DescribeSecurityPolicy.description: Grants permission to describe a security policy

DescribeServer.name: DescribeServer
DescribeServer.description: Grants permission to describe a server

DescribeUser.name: DescribeUser
DescribeUser.description: Grants permission to describe a user associated with a server

ImportSshPublicKey.name: ImportSshPublicKey
ImportSshPublicKey.description: Grants permission to add an SSH public key to a user

ListSecurityPolicies.name: ListSecurityPolicies
ListSecurityPolicies.description: Grants permission to list security policies

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a server or a user

ListUsers.name: ListUsers
ListUsers.description: Grants permission to list users associated with a server

StartServer.name: StartServer
StartServer.description: Grants permission to start a server

StopServer.name: StopServer
StopServer.description: Grants permission to stop a server

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag a server or a user

TestIdentityProvider.name: TestIdentityProvider
TestIdentityProvider.description: Grants permission to test a server's custom identity provider

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag a server or a user

UpdateServer.name: UpdateServer
UpdateServer.description: Grants permission to update the configuration of a server

UpdateUser.name: UpdateUser
UpdateUser.description: Grants permission to update the configuration of a user
